name: Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon
text:
Dark Magician + 1 Blue-Eyes Monster
This monster must be Fusion Summoned from the Extra Deck using the fusion materials listed above and cannot be Fusion Summoned by other ways. This card cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects. Once per turn, during either player's turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can discard a card from your hand; Negate the activation, then, target 1 card your opponent controls and if you do then banish the targeted card, then if the card banished by this effect was a monster destroy 1 card in your opponents hand, then if you did that this card also gains 500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn, you can target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it, and if you do; Deal damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the original ATK of the banised monster, and if you do that while this card was Fusion Summoned with 2 normal monsters, this card can make up to 2 attacks this turn.
